translations.CONFIRM_DELETE_USER_ACCOUNT: Are you sure you want to delete this user account?
translations.CONFIRM_UPDATE_USER_ACCOUNT: Are you sure you want to change your user account?
translations.CONFIRM_UPDATE_USER_ACCOUNTS: Are you sure you want to change all user accounts?
translations.ERROR_LOGIN_ONLY_ALPHANUMERIC_CHAR: The identifier must contain only alphanumeric characters
translations.ERROR_UNABLE_TO_CREATE_USER_ACCOUNT: Unable to create this user account
translations.ERROR_UNABLE_TO_MODIFY_USER_ACCOUNT: Unable to modify this user account
translations.ERROR_UNABLE_TO_DELETE_USER_ACCOUNT: Unable to delete this user account
translations.ERROR_TRY_DELETE_LAST_USER_ACCOUNT: You must keep at least one user account
